description.it: Ottieni almeno <target> punti <counterNameA> al giorno per <periodTarget> giorni e avrai un bonus di <bonusScore> punti <bonusPointType>.
description.en: Get at least <target> <counterNameA> points daily for <periodTarget> days and you will get a bonus of <bonusScore> <bonusPointType> points.

description.it: Fai almeno <target> km <counterNameA> al giorno per <periodTarget> giorni e avrai un bonus di <bonusScore> punti <bonusPointType>.
description.en: Do at least <target> km <counterNameA> daily for <periodTarget> days and you will get a bonus of <bonusScore> <bonusPointType> points.

description.it: Fai almeno <target> viaggi <counterNameA> al giorno per <periodTarget> giorni e avrai un bonus di <bonusScore> punti <bonusPointType>.
description.en: Do at least <target> trips <counterNameA> daily for <periodTarget> days and you will get a bonus of <bonusScore> <bonusPointType> points.

description.it: Fai almeno <target> viaggi al giorno senza usare <counter> per <periodTarget> giorni e avrai un bonus di <bonusScore> punti <bonusPointType>.
description.en: Do at least <target> trips daily without <counter> for <periodTarget> days and you will get a bonus of <bonusScore> <bonusPointType> points.

description.it: Raccomanda la App ad almeno <target> utenti <counter> al giorno per <periodTarget> giorni e avrai un bonus di <bonusScore> punti <bonusPointType>.
description.en: Recommend the app to at least <target> users daily for <periodTarget> days and you will get a bonus of <bonusScore> <bonusPointType> points.

description.it: Fai almeno <target> km <counterNameA> e avrai un bonus di <bonusScore> punti <bonusPointType>.
description.en: Do at least <target> km <counterNameA> and you will get a bonus of <bonusScore> <bonusPointType> points.

description.it: Fai almeno <target> viaggi <counterNameA> e avrai un bonus di <bonusScore> punti <bonusPointType>.
description.en: Do at least <target> trips <counterNameA> and you will get a bonus of <bonusScore> <bonusPointType> points.

description.it: Fai almeno <target> viaggi senza usare <counterNameA> e avrai un bonus di <bonusScore> punti <bonusPointType>.
description.en: Do at least <target> trips without <counterNameA> and you will get a bonus of <bonusScore> <bonusPointType> points.

description.it: Ottieni almeno <target> punti <counterNameA> e avrai <bonusScore> punti <bonusPointType> in bonus.
description.en: Get at least <target> <counterNameA> points and you will have <bonusScore> additional <bonusPointType> bonus points.

description.it: Raccomanda la App ad almeno <target> utenti e guadagni <bonusScore> punti <bonusPointType>.
description.en: Recommend the app to at least <target> users and you will gain a bonus of <bonusScore> <bonusPointType> points.

description.it: Fai almeno altri <target> km <counterNameA> e avrai un bonus di <bonusScore> punti <bonusPointType>.
description.en: Do at least <target> more km <counterNameA> and you will get a bonus of <bonusScore> <bonusPointType> points.

description.it: Fai almeno altri <target> viaggi <counterNameA> e avrai un bonus di <bonusScore> punti <bonusPointType>.
description.en: Do at least <target> more trips <counterNameA> and you will get a bonus of <bonusScore> <bonusPointType> points.

description.it: Fai almeno <target> viaggi senza usare <counterNameA> e avrai un bonus di <bonusScore> punti <bonusPointType>.
description.en: Do at least <target> trips without <counterNameA> and you will get a bonus of <bonusScore> <bonusPointType> points.

description.it: Ottieni almeno altri <target> punti <counterNameA> e avrai ulteriori <bonusScore> punti <bonusPointType> in bonus.
description.en: Get at least <target> more <counterNameA> points and you will get <bonusScore> additional <bonusPointType> bonus points.

description.it: Ottieni almeno <target> badge nella Badge Collection "<badgeCollectionName>" e vinci un bonus di <bonusScore> punti <bonusPointType>.
description.en: Get at least <target> badges in "<badgeCollectionName>" Badge Collection and you will get a bonus of <bonusScore> <bonusPointType> points.

description.it: Raggiungi una posizione compresa tra il <posMin>° e il <posMax>° posto nella classifica finale di questa settimana e vinci un bonus di <bonusScore> punti <bonusPointType>.
description.en: Rank in between place <posMin> and place <posMax> in the final leaderboard of the current week and you will win a bonus of <bonusScore> <bonusPointType> points.

description.it: Compila il questionario e guadagna <bonusScore> punti <bonusPointType>.
description.en: Fill out the survey and gain a bonus of <bonusScore> <bonusPointType> points.

description.it: Fai un viaggio in battello, compila il questionario e guadagna <bonusScore> punti <bonusPointType>.
description.en: Complete a boat trip, fill out the survey and gain a bonus of <bonusScore> <bonusPointType> points.

description.it: Sabato 29 o domenica 30 ottobre visita lo stand ViaggiaTrento Play&Go a "Fa' la cosa giusta!" ( TrentoFiere - Via di Briamasco, 2) usando una modalita' di trasporto sostenibile e vinci un bonus di <bonusScore> punti <bonusPointType>.
description.en: On Saturday Oct. 29 or Sunday Oct. 30, visit the ViaggiaTrento Play&Go booth in the "Fa' la cosa giusta!" fair (TrentoFiere - Via di Briamasco, 2) using a sustainable transport mode, and you will win a bonus of <bonusScore> <bonusPointType> points.

description.it: Vieni a trovarci Venerdi' 29 settembre alla Notte dei Ricercatori al MUSE (Corso del Lavoro e della Scienza, 3, Trento) e vinci un bonus di <bonusScore> punti <bonusPointType>.
description.en: Come and visit us on Friday September 29 at the Researchers’ Night at MUSE (Corso del Lavoro e della Scienza, 3, Trento) and you will win a bonus of <bonusScore> <bonusPointType> points.

description.it: Guadagna più punti green leaves del tuo avversario <opponent>. Otterrai un bonus del <rewardPercentage>% sul totale dei punti guadagnati in settimana.
description.en: To win this challenge, gain more green leaves point than your opponent <opponent>. The winner will get a <rewardPercentage>% bonus of all the points got during the week.

description.it: Fai più kilometri in bici del tuo avversario <opponent>. Otterrai un bonus del <rewardPercentage>% sul totale dei punti guadagnati in settimana.
description.en: Do more bike km than your opponent <opponent>. The winner will get a <rewardPercentage>% bonus of all the points got during the week.

description.it: Fai più kilometri a piedi del tuo avversario <opponent>. Otterrai un bonus del <rewardPercentage>% sul totale dei punti guadagnati in settimana.
description.en: Walk more km than your opponent <opponent>. The winner will get a <rewardPercentage>% bonus of all the points got during the week.

description.it: Guadagna <challengeTarget> green leaves prima del tuo avversario <opponent>. Se vinci otterrai un bonus di <rewardBonusScore> green leaves, se vince <opponent> otterrà <challengerBonusScore> green leaves.
description.en: Gain <challengeTarget> green leaves point faster than your opponent <opponent>. If you win, you'll get <rewardBonusScore> green leaves. If you lose, <opponent> will get <challengerBonusScore> green leaves.

description.it: Fai <challengeTarget> km in bici prima del tuo avversario <opponent>. Se vinci otterrai un bonus di <rewardBonusScore> green leaves, se vince <opponent> otterrà <challengerBonusScore> green leaves.
description.en: Bike <challengeTarget> km before your opponent <opponent>. If you win, you'll get <rewardBonusScore> green leaves. If you lose, <opponent> will get <challengerBonusScore> green leaves.

description.it: Fai <challengeTarget> km a piedi prima del tuo avversario <opponent>. Se vinci otterrai un bonus di <rewardBonusScore> green leaves, se vince <opponent> otterrà <challengerBonusScore> green leaves.
description.en: Walk <challengeTarget> km before your opponent <opponent>. If you win, you'll get <rewardBonusScore> green leaves. If you lose, <opponent> will get <challengerBonusScore> green leaves.

description.it: Unite le forze e guadagnate almeno <target> green leaves. Se vincete la sfida, sia tu che <opponent> otterrete un bonus di <reward> green leaves.
description.en: Join the forces: gain at least <target> green leaves together with <opponent>. If you win, you'll both get <reward> green leaves.

description.it: Unite le forze e fate almeno <target> km in bici. Se vincete la sfida, sia tu che <opponent> otterrete un bonus di <reward> green leaves.
description.en: Join forces: bike at least <target> km between you and <opponent>. If you win, you'll both get <reward> green leaves.

description.it: Unite le forze e fate almeno <target> km a piedi. Se vincete la sfida, sia tu che <opponent> otterrete un bonus di <reward> green leaves.
description.en: Join forces: walk at least <target> km between you and <opponent>. If you win, you'll both get <reward> green leaves.

description.it: Vinci una sfida di coppia di qualsiasi tipo ed ottieni <bonusScore> punti green leaves addizionali.
description.en: Win one multiplayer challenge of any kind to obtain additional <bonusScore> green leaves points.
